text: Ellimmichthys is an extinct genus of double-armored herring from the Lower Cretaceous. == Species == * †Ellimmichthys longicostatus (Cope, 1886) (type species) * †Ellimmichthys goodi (Eastman, 1912) * †Ellimmichthys spinosus de Figuereido & Gallo, 2021 == References == # de Figueiredo, Francisco J.; Gallo, Valéria (2021). "Revision of †Ellimmichthys longicostatus (Clupeomorpha: †Ellimmichthyiformes) from the Lower Cretaceous of Brazil with comments on the taxonomy of related species". Journal of South American Earth Sciences. Category:Animals of South America Category:Extinct fish Category:Ray-finned fish Category:Freshwater fish
title: Ellimmichthys
